relation.text: written in the beginning of April
early in October next . Harriot will aſsist
will become of Us next Spring
will prolong my Absence from Britain for at least two Years
many years paſs on . Tythes are the present griev an ce complained
remain My Dear Sister , Your faithfull & affectionate Brother Napier . Mrs- Dickenson IRELAND KINSALE Taxal By Chapel le Frith . Lord Napier Lord Napier July 1786
